name: SCNMorpherCalculationMode
desc: The interpolation formulas for blending between target geometries.

items.name: case normalized
items.desc: Target weights must be in the range between 0.0 and 1.0, and the contribution of the base geometry to the morphed surface is related to the sum of target weights. This is the default mode.

items.name: case additive
items.desc: Target weights may take on any value, and weighted contributions for each target are added to the base geometry,
